remarks: Distribution of division over subtraction.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divassapd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C # 0 ) $.
divsubdirapd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) / C ) = ( ( A / C ) - ( B / C ) ) ) $.
